 17 /**
 18  * Abstract filesystem definition.
 19  *
 20  * @class Abstract filesystem definition.
 21  */
 22 bigshot.FileSystem = function () {
 23 }
 24 
 25 bigshot.FileSystem.prototype = {
 26     /**
 27      * Returns the URL filename for the given filesystem entry.
 28      *
 29      * @param {String} name the entry name
 30      */
 31     getFilename : function (name) {},
 32     
 33     /**
 34      * Returns the entry filename for the given tile.
 35      * 
 36      * @param {int} tileX the column of the tile
 37      * @param {int} tileY the row of the tile
 38      * @param {int} zoomLevel the zoom level
 39      */
 40     getImageFilename : function (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel) {},
 41     
 42     /**
 43      * Sets an optional prefix that is prepended, along with a forward
 44      * slash ("/"), to all names.
 45      *
 46      * @param {String} prefix the prefix
 47      */
 48     setPrefix : function (prefix) {},
 49     
 50     /**
 51      * Returns an image descriptor object from the descriptor file.
 52      *
 53      * @return a descriptor object
 54      */
 55     getDescriptor : function () {},
 56     
 57     /**
 58      * Returns the poster URL filename. For Bigshot images this is
 59      * typically the URL corresponding to the entry "poster.jpg", 
 60      * but for other filesystems it can be different.
 61      */
 62     getPosterFilename : function () {}
 63 };
 64 
 65 /**
 66  * Sets up a filesystem instance in the given parameters object, if none exist.
 67  * If the {@link bigshot.ImageParameters#fileSystem} member isn't set, the 
 68  * {@link bigshot.ImageParameters#fileSystemType} member is used to create a new 
 69  * {@link bigshot.FileSystem} instance and set it.
 70  *
 71  * @param {bigshot.ImageParameters or bigshot.VRPanoramaParameters or bigshot.ImageCarouselPanoramaParameters} parameters the parameters object to populate
 72  */
 73 bigshot.setupFileSystem = function (parameters) {
 74     if (!parameters.fileSystem) {
 75         if (parameters.fileSystemType == "archive") {
 76             parameters.fileSystem = new bigshot.ArchiveFileSystem (parameters);
 77         } else if (parameters.fileSystemType == "dzi") {
 78             parameters.fileSystem = new bigshot.DeepZoomImageFileSystem (parameters);
 79         } else if (parameters.fileSystemType == "simple") {
 80             parameters.fileSystem = new bigshot.SimpleFileSystem (parameters);
 81         } else {
 82             parameters.fileSystem = new bigshot.FolderFileSystem (parameters);
 83         }
 84     }
 85 }
 86
